url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@300;400;700&display=swap");:root{--blue:#70d7ff;--yellow:#ffd426;--graystrong:#1c1c1e;--graymid:#3a3a3c;--graylight:#545458;--grayverylight:#767680;--dropshadow:1px 0px 1px #000,0px 1px 1px #000,2px 1px 1px #000,1px 2px 1px #000,3px 2px 1px #000,2px 3px 1px #000,4px 3px 1px #000,3px 4px 1px #000,5px 4px 1px #000,4px 5px 1px #000,6px 5px 1px #000,5px 6px 1px #000}*{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0;font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif}body{background-color:var(--graystrong);color:#fff;width:80vw;margin:auto;text-size-adjust:auto}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:.5vw}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:transparent}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:var(--grayverylight);border-radius:1rem}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:var(--graymid)}button{cursor:pointer}a img:hover{opacity:.7}.bluetext{color:var(--blue)}.yellowtext{color:var(--yellow);font-size:3vw;line-height:.1rem}.whitetext,body a{color:#fff}body a{text-decoration:none}button:hover{opacity:.7}.sticky{position:fixed;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;width:80vw;padding-top:.5vh;height:fit-content;z-index:15;background-color:rgba(27,27,29,.9);border-bottom-left-radius:1vw;border-bottom-right-radius:1vw}#particles-js{position:absolute;z-index:9;width:99vw;height:100vh;transform:translateX(-10vw)}header{position:relative;height:100vh;text-shadow:var(--dropshadow)}body nav{padding-top:5vh;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;height:10vh;transition:padding .75s ease 0s}body nav ul{display:flex;gap:.5vw;list-style-type:none;font-size:1.8vw}body nav ul li{display:relative;padding:1vh 1vw}nav ul a{z-index:10;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;text-decoration:none;display:inline-block;position:relative}nav ul a:after{background:none repeat scroll 0 0 transparent;bottom:0;content:"";display:block;height:1vw;left:50%;position:absolute;background:var(--grayverylight);transition:width .3s ease 0s,left .3s ease 0s;width:0;z-index:-1}nav ul a:hover:after{width:100%;left:0}header nav .pre-nav-number{font-size:1.1vw;font-weight:400}header nav 3vw;font-size:1.9vw;margin-top:3vw;font-weight:700}.hero .icons{gap:3vh;display:flex;flex-direction:column;z-index:10}.hero .icon{max-width:3rem;width:5vw;height:auto}.ruben-portrait{height:min(65vw,65vh);width:auto;transform:translateX(-2rem);z-index:-2}.scrolldown{position:absolute;bottom:15rem;right:-4rem;font-size:1.4vw;transform:rotate(90deg)}.line{height:2px;width:98vw;background-color:var(--grayverylight);transform:translateX(-9vw)}.line-1{bottom:0;position:absolute}.upBtn{width:3vw;aspect-ratio:1/1;background-color:#fff;position:fixed;bottom:2vw;min-width:2rem;right:2vw;color:var(--blue);font-size:max(2vw,4vh);font-weight:700;text-align:center;border-radius:.5vw;z-index:10;transition:all 1s ease 0s}.upBtn:hover{opacity:.8;cursor:pointer}.project{display:flex;justify-content:space-around;margin:min(8vh,4vw) auto;gap:3vw;text-align:center}.project-2{flex-direction:row-reverse}body h2{font-size:3vw;text-align:center;transform:translateX(-2vw);margin:min(7vh,5vw) auto;font-weight:700;text-shadow:var(--dropshadow)}h2 move-forever{0%{transform:translate3d(-90px,0,0)}to{transform:translate3d(85px,0,0)}}.burgermenu{position:fixed;flex-direction:column;top:0;right:0;display:none;transition:all .5s ease
